name: Shanty Car Parking
description:
Simple nice car parking game
Real 3D parking game with nice car and real fantastic environment
Nice 3D car parking and car racing, rally game
How fast your will drive and parking your car complete all 8 levels well ??
This game is very basic of parking game you can play
Just use gas, brake,steering right and left buttons to control your parking car move to parking spot.
And there is a switching vision button for changing your view of car so you can easy parking your car.
There are 8 levels of car parking, racing, rally you can play, time parked will be recorded and displayed on final scene completing.
see this video of Muscle Car Parking game
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6sanT-kjM8U&feature=youtu.be
